backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing lead submissions, payment updates with authorization, and a global urgency slot system with timed resets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Documentation explaining features, payment configuration, admin panel, and deployment setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the landing page flow, admin panel toggle, and step transitions.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Admin-only table view showing all submissions with payment status and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: Warning banner that appears when the backend is unreachable, using shadcn/ui Alert.
Form component that validates user details and submits them to the backend, handling errors and connectivity status.
frontend/src/components/OfferDetails.tsx: Displays Canva Pro offer pricing and a list of included premium features.
frontend/src/components/PaymentConfirmat: Shows a confirmation message after payment with expected access timeline and next steps.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSection.t: Provides QR code payment instructions and lets users mark their payment as completed by calling the backend.
frontend/src/components/UrgencyBanner.ts: Fetches and displays the number of remaining discounted slots, showing a loading state when needed.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Loads environment config and creates a properly configured backend actor for local or production use.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Stores static payment configuration including UPI link, amount, and product description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches the backend actor, updating it on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectivit: Checks backend reachability via a lightweight query and reports connectivity status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and exposing login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query to fetch all submissions via the actor, enabled when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useUrgencySlots.ts: Fetches remaining urgency slots from the actor with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes and logs actor-related errors into structured categories and messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, architecture notes, and known issues for the Canva Pro landing workflow.
